sentences.en: But words are tyrannical things, they exist for their meanings.
sentences.cn: 但是“词”这个东西是很严峻的, 它之所以存在,就是因为有一定的意义.

sentences.en: He has a tyrannical reign on his empire.
He thought he should rescue her from a tyrannical family.
sentences.cn: 他认为他应该把她从专制家庭中拯救出来.

sentences.en: He was just as feared and reviled as his tyrannical parents.
sentences.cn: 他和他专横残暴的父母一样为人惧怕和憎恨。

sentences.en: His behavior grew more unpredictable by the day, and increasingly tyrannical.
sentences.cn: 他的行为越来越难以捉摸，而且愈发残暴。

sentences.en: I think you're very harsh and tyrannical.
sentences.cn: 我看你太严酷,太霸道了.

sentences.en: Jie was extremely tyrannical and dissolute.
sentences.cn: 桀是个极端残暴、放荡的人.

sentences.en: Oh , of course, I was exacting and tyrannical and unkind.
sentences.cn: 啊! 当然, 我苛刻,专横,粗暴.

sentences.en: She married to get away from her tyrannical mother.
sentences.cn: 她为了脱离她那个暴虐的母亲而结婚.

sentences.en: The conductor tends to be tyrannical at concert rehearsals.
sentences.cn: 那指挥在音乐会排演时态度往往变得很专横.

sentences.en: The intruders'tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
sentences.cn: 侵略者的残虐的行径,激起了当地民众的反抗.

sentences.en: They also become spoiled and tyrannical.
sentences.cn: 朋友也更容易被宠坏,而变得蛮横.

sentences.en: Tyrannical Hollywood film moguls ruled their stars'lives.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞电影巨头操纵着旗下明星的生活.

sentences.en: Yet this same lust for tyrannical conquest is also their greatest weakness.
sentences.cn: 同时,对于残忍征服的渴望也是他们的最大弱点.

trans.tran_cn: 暴君的，暴君似的，专制的，专横的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a cruel and unfair way towards someone you have power over
